class="okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init"><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><b>Nintendo Switch『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』</b>が、本日10月16日（金）、発売されました！<br>『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』のセットには、<u>カメラが内蔵された<b>カート</b></u>が入っています。<u>カートから見える<b>部屋の景色がサーキットに早変わり</b>する、リアルとゲームが連動した<b>新しい「マリオカート」</b></u>なんです。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-0 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-0 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-0 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16004247091640/400/01.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-0 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-0 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124023684064/400/02.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">本作をご存知ないという方は、まずはこちらの紹介映像をご覧ください。<br></p></div></div><div class="movie-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" movie-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="detail-movie" okra-youtube-element-component="" style=""><div class="okra-youtube ng-star-inserted" okrayoutubeplayer=""><div class="okra-youtube-inner"><div id="LvPON803cOQki72cq7n" class="ng-star-inserted"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">映像をご覧になって、「自分の部屋に、どうやってコースをつくったらいいの？」という疑問を持った方もいらっしゃるかもしれません。そこで、この記事では、<u>コースづくりのヒントをご紹介</u>します。<br></p></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">4つのゲートをくぐればサーキット完成<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">サーキットづくりはとても簡単。付属の<u>4つの<b>ゲート</b>を部屋に置いて、<b>カート</b>で1周するだけで、走った軌跡がそのままサーキットに</u>なります。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-1 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-1 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-1 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124514554578/400/03.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-1 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-1 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124518409345/400/04.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">コースの描き方のコツ</span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">つくえやベッドをトンネルに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><u>コースづくりには、<b>6帖以上</b>のスペースがオススメ</u>です。とはいえ、何もないスペースを用意する必要はありません。<br>例えば<u>つくえやいすの脚の下</u>をサーキットにしてみると、トンネルのような見た目になり、レースの迫力が増します。また、脚が障害物になるので、あなたのドライブの腕が試されるコースに！<br></p></div></div><div carousel-element-component="" class="carousel-element ng-tns-c1-2 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="detail-switcher" okra-carousel-element-component="" okramql="" style="height:NaNpx;"><div class="okra-carousel" okracarousel=""><div class="detail-switcher__container"><div class="detail-switcher__stage" style="transform:translate3d(0px, 0, 0);transition-duration:0ms;"><div class="detail-switcher__item is-active ng-star-inserted"><div class="detail-switcher__media has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235917039508/0/05.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div><div class="detail-switcher__item ng-star-inserted"><div class="detail-switcher__media has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235921341892/0/06.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div><a href="#" class="detail-switcher__prev is-disabled ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;">PREV</a><a href="#" class="detail-switcher__next ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;">NEXT</a><div class="detail-switcher__pagination ng-star-inserted"><span class="detail-switcher__pagination-item is-current ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;"> 0 </span><span class="detail-switcher__pagination-item ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;"> 1 </span></div></div></div><div class="nc3-js-nav detail-switcher-nav" style="display:none;"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__wrap"><div class="swiper-container-2d0af188-313d-477b-a285-cb7cfd5527fc" classname="swiper-container-2d0af188-313d-477b-a285-cb7cfd5527fc"><ul class="detail-switcher-nav__itemWrap swiper-wrapper"><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-2 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner is-active"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__media" style="background-image:url(https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235917039508/400/05.jpg);"><span class="ng-tns-c1-2"></span></div></div></li><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-2 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__media" style="background-image:url(https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235921341892/400/06.jpg);"><span class="ng-tns-c1-2"></span></div></div></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ベッドの下の隙間をルートにしてみると、比較的狭い場所でも遊べるうえ、普段なかなか見られない場所がサーキットの一部に変化して面白いかもしれません。<br></p></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ドリフトを想定した鋭角カーブ<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">カートを走らせながら<u><b>Rボタン</b>で<b>ドリフト</b>をすると、鋭角なカーブを描く</u>ことができ、<br>コースの形の幅が広がります。コースづくりでドリフトを多用すれば、ドリフトを使わないと大きなタイムロスになる鋭角カーブだらけのコースをつくることもできます。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235929088556/0/07.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div okra-text-element-component="" class="detail-img-outline-caption ng-star-inserted"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><span data-okra-font-size="4" style="color: rgb(60, 60, 60);">星形のコースだってつくれます。</span></p></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">空きスペースを細長いコースに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">細長い空きスペースしかない場合でも、ゲートを連続で置くことで長い直線を持つコースをつくることができます。直線上で<b>「ダッシュキノコ」</b>を使ってライバルにレースで逆転したりと、直線ならではのストイックな駆け引きが生まれるかもしれません。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235934840366/0/23.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">身の回りのものを使って、コースを装飾<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">小物をガードレールに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">家で普段使っている雑貨などの小物を装飾に使うことで、サーキットの雰囲気はガラッと変化します。例えば、<u><b>コップ</b>をならべてコースの<b>ガードレール</b>に</u>使ったり、ティッシュの箱を障害物にして置いたりすると、見た目が華やかになるのに加え、ルートがわかりやすくなるメリットもあります。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-3 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-3 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-3 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235955335031/400/08.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-3 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-3 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000000967550/400/09.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">カーペットでダートコースを演出<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">あえて毛足の短い<b>カーペット</b>などの上をコースに取り入れると、カートが走っている時のゲーム画面がガタガタと揺れ、ダートコースのような挙動となってレースの臨場感もアップします。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix img-width-65" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000013911448/0/10.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">空き箱でトンネルづくり<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><u><b>段ボール</b>や<b>空き箱</b>、<b>画用紙</b>などで<b>トンネル</b>をつくる</u>こともできます。トンネルをルートに組み込めば、レース中の景色を一瞬にして暗くさせたり、奥に障害物を置いて遊んでもらう友達を驚かせることもできそうです。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-4 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-4 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-4 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000026443507/400/11.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-4 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-4 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000031359255/400/12.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">コースの案内は矢印看板で<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">つくったコースを友達に遊んでもらった時、どちらに走ればいいかわかりにくそうな場所があった場合などには、<b>看板</b>の出番です。セットに2つ付属される<u><b>矢印看板</b>を部屋に置くと、ゲームの中では<b>動く矢印看板</b>に</u>早変わり。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-5 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-5 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-5 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15131039462582/400/13.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-5 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-5 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15131041939781/400/14.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">矢印看板が２つで足りない場合は、<u>同じものを<b>コピー印刷</b>して増やすことも</u>できます。また、<a href="https://www.nintendo.co.jp/support/switch/software_support/img/mklive/gate.pdf" target="_blank"><b>こちら</b></a>から<u><b>矢印看板</b>や<b>ゲート</b>の<b>印刷用データ（pdf）</b></u><u>をダウンロード</u>できますので、<b>A4サイズ</b>で印刷してコースづくりにご活用ください！</p></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">初代マリオカートのコースをつくって<br>遊んでみました<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ここまでにご紹介したコースづくりのコツを使って（？）、<u>初代<b>『スーパーマリオカート』</b>のコースをモチーフにコースづくりをしてみました</u>！<br></p></div></div><div class="movie-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" movie-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="detail-movie" okra-youtube-element-component="" style=""><div class="okra-youtube ng-star-inserted" okrayoutubeplayer=""><div class="okra-youtube-inner"><div id="XRALkO7XD9Yu1ngcc2l" class="ng-star-inserted"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div carousel-element-component="" class="carousel-element ng-tns-c1-6 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="detail-switcher" okra-carousel-element-component="" okramql="" style="height:NaNpx;"><div class="okra-carousel" okracarousel=""><div class="detail-switcher__container"><div class="detail-switcher__stage" style="display:none;"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__wrap"><div class="swiper-container-e1939824-e314-43ce-8015-5764f4255508" classname="swiper-container-e1939824-e314-43ce-8015-5764f4255508"><ul class="detail-switcher-nav__itemWrap swiper-wrapper"><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-6 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">みなさんも<b>『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』</b>で、自分だけのサーキットづくりをお楽しみください！<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-7 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp Switch『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』&l;/b&g;が、本日10月16日（金）、発売されました！&l;br&g;『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』のセットには、&l;u&g;カメラが内蔵された&l;b&g;カート&l;/b&g;&l;/u&g;が入っています。&l;u&g;カートから見える&l;b&g;部屋の景色がサーキットに早変わり&l;/b&g;する、リアルとゲームが連動した&l;b&g;新しい「マリオカート」&l;/b&g;&l;/u&g;なんです。&l;br&g;&q;,&q;blank&q;:false,&q;label&q;:&q;text&q;,&q;fragment&q;:null}],&q;attributes&q;:[{&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-attr-boolean&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;remove-margin-bottom&q;,&q;value&q;:true,&q;is_formatted&q;:true,&q;name&q;:&q;下マージンを削除する&q;,&q;order&q;:3},{&q;default_value&q;:&q;左揃え&q;,&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-attr-select&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;text-align&q;,&q;value&q;:&q;左揃え&q;,&q;list&q;:[{&q;name&q;:&q;左揃え&q;,&q;value&q;:&q;左揃え&q;},{&q;name&q;:&q;中央揃え&q;,&q;value&q;:&q;中央揃え&q;},{&q;name&q;:&q;右揃え&q;,&q;value&q;:&q;右揃え&q;}],&q;type&q;:&q;radio&q;,&q;is_formatted&q;:true,&q;name&q;:&q;配置&q;,&q;order&q;:2},{&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-attr-boolean&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;インデントする&q;,&q;is_formatted&q;:true,&q;name&q;:&q;インデントする&q;,&q;order&q;:1},{&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-attr-boolean&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;add-margin-top&q;,&q;is_formatted&q;:true,&q;name&q;:&q;上マージンを追加する&q;,&q;order&q;:4}],&q;uuid&q;:&q;4a5a3135-8433-4fbd-b144-bff8f4994382&q;},{&q;listeners&q;:{},&q;kind&q;:&q;images-2column&q;,&q;link&q;:null,&q;blank&q;:null,&q;order&q;:2,&q;elements&q;:[{&q;id&q;:29057,&q;alt&q;:&q;&q;,&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-image&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;image-01&q;},{&q;id&q;:29017,&q;alt&q;:&q;&q;,&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-image&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;image-02&q;}],&q;attributes&q;:[{&q;kind&q;:&q;okra-attr-boolean&q;,&q;label&q;:&q;1: href="/category?c=%E3%83%9E%E3%83%AA%E3%82%AA%E3%82%AB%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88%20%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%83%96%20%E3%83%9B%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B5%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AD%E3%83%83%E3%83%88" class="okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init"><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><b>Nintendo Switch『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』</b>が、本日10月16日（金）、発売されました！<br>『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』のセットには、<u>カメラが内蔵された<b>カート</b></u>が入っています。<u>カートから見える<b>部屋の景色がサーキットに早変わり</b>する、リアルとゲームが連動した<b>新しい「マリオカート」</b></u>なんです。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-0 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-0 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-0 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16004247091640/400/01.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-0 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-0 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124023684064/400/02.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">本作をご存知ないという方は、まずはこちらの紹介映像をご覧ください。<br></p></div></div><div class="movie-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" movie-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="detail-movie" okra-youtube-element-component="" style=""><div class="okra-youtube ng-star-inserted" okrayoutubeplayer=""><div class="okra-youtube-inner"><div id="LvPON803cOQki72cq7n" class="ng-star-inserted"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">映像をご覧になって、「自分の部屋に、どうやってコースをつくったらいいの？」という疑問を持った方もいらっしゃるかもしれません。そこで、この記事では、<u>コースづくりのヒントをご紹介</u>します。<br></p></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">4つのゲートをくぐればサーキット完成<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">サーキットづくりはとても簡単。付属の<u>4つの<b>ゲート</b>を部屋に置いて、<b>カート</b>で1周するだけで、走った軌跡がそのままサーキットに</u>なります。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-1 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-1 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-1 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124514554578/400/03.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-1 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-1 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124518409345/400/04.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">コースの描き方のコツ</span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">つくえやベッドをトンネルに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><u>コースづくりには、<b>6帖以上</b>のスペースがオススメ</u>です。とはいえ、何もないスペースを用意する必要はありません。<br>例えば<u>つくえやいすの脚の下</u>をサーキットにしてみると、トンネルのような見た目になり、レースの迫力が増します。また、脚が障害物になるので、あなたのドライブの腕が試されるコースに！<br></p></div></div><div carousel-element-component="" class="carousel-element ng-tns-c1-2 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="detail-switcher" okra-carousel-element-component="" okramql="" style="height:NaNpx;"><div class="okra-carousel" okracarousel=""><div class="detail-switcher__container"><div class="detail-switcher__stage" style="transform:translate3d(0px, 0, 0);transition-duration:0ms;"><div class="detail-switcher__item is-active ng-star-inserted"><div class="detail-switcher__media has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235917039508/0/05.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div><div class="detail-switcher__item ng-star-inserted"><div class="detail-switcher__media has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235921341892/0/06.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div><a href="#" class="detail-switcher__prev is-disabled ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;">PREV</a><a href="#" class="detail-switcher__next ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;">NEXT</a><div class="detail-switcher__pagination ng-star-inserted"><span class="detail-switcher__pagination-item is-current ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;"> 0 </span><span class="detail-switcher__pagination-item ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;"> 1 </span></div></div></div><div class="nc3-js-nav detail-switcher-nav" style="display:none;"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__wrap"><div class="swiper-container-2d0af188-313d-477b-a285-cb7cfd5527fc" classname="swiper-container-2d0af188-313d-477b-a285-cb7cfd5527fc"><ul class="detail-switcher-nav__itemWrap swiper-wrapper"><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-2 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner is-active"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__media" style="background-image:url(https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235917039508/400/05.jpg);"><span class="ng-tns-c1-2"></span></div></div></li><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-2 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__media" style="background-image:url(https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235921341892/400/06.jpg);"><span class="ng-tns-c1-2"></span></div></div></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ベッドの下の隙間をルートにしてみると、比較的狭い場所でも遊べるうえ、普段なかなか見られない場所がサーキットの一部に変化して面白いかもしれません。<br></p></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ドリフトを想定した鋭角カーブ<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">カートを走らせながら<u><b>Rボタン</b>で<b>ドリフト</b>をすると、鋭角なカーブを描く</u>ことができ、<br>コースの形の幅が広がります。コースづくりでドリフトを多用すれば、ドリフトを使わないと大きなタイムロスになる鋭角カーブだらけのコースをつくることもできます。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235929088556/0/07.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div okra-text-element-component="" class="detail-img-outline-caption ng-star-inserted"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><span data-okra-font-size="4" style="color: rgb(60, 60, 60);">星形のコースだってつくれます。</span></p></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">空きスペースを細長いコースに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">細長い空きスペースしかない場合でも、ゲートを連続で置くことで長い直線を持つコースをつくることができます。直線上で<b>「ダッシュキノコ」</b>を使ってライバルにレースで逆転したりと、直線ならではのストイックな駆け引きが生まれるかもしれません。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235934840366/0/23.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">身の回りのものを使って、コースを装飾<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">小物をガードレールに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">家で普段使っている雑貨などの小物を装飾に使うことで、サーキットの雰囲気はガラッと変化します。例えば、<u><b>コップ</b>をならべてコースの<b>ガードレール</b>に</u>使ったり、ティッシュの箱を障害物にして置いたりすると、見た目が華やかになるのに加え、ルートがわかりやすくなるメリットもあります。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-3 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-3 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-3 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235955335031/400/08.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-3 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-3 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000000967550/400/09.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">カーペットでダートコースを演出<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">あえて毛足の短い<b>カーペット</b>などの上をコースに取り入れると、カートが走っている時のゲーム画面がガタガタと揺れ、ダートコースのような挙動となってレースの臨場感もアップします。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix img-width-65" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000013911448/0/10.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">空き箱でトンネルづくり<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><u><b>段ボール</b>や<b>空き箱</b>、<b>画用紙</b>などで<b>トンネル</b>をつくる</u>こともできます。トンネルをルートに組み込めば、レース中の景色を一瞬にして暗くさせたり、奥に障害物を置いて遊んでもらう友達を驚かせることもできそうです。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-4 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-4 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-4 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000026443507/400/11.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-4 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-4 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000031359255/400/12.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">コースの案内は矢印看板で<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">つくったコースを友達に遊んでもらった時、どちらに走ればいいかわかりにくそうな場所があった場合などには、<b>看板</b>の出番です。セットに2つ付属される<u><b>矢印看板</b>を部屋に置くと、ゲームの中では<b>動く矢印看板</b>に</u>早変わり。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-5 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-5 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-5 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15131039462582/400/13.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-5 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-5 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15131041939781/400/14.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">矢印看板が２つで足りない場合は、<u>同じものを<b>コピー印刷</b>して増やすことも</u>できます。また、<a href="https://www.nintendo.co.jp/support/switch/software_support/img/mklive/gate.pdf" target="_blank"><b>こちら</b></a>から<u><b>矢印看板</b>や<b>ゲート</b>の<b>印刷用データ（pdf）</b></u><u>をダウンロード</u>できますので、<b>A4サイズ</b>で印刷してコースづくりにご活用ください！</p></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">初代マリオカートのコースをつくって<br>遊んでみました<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ここまでにご紹介したコースづくりのコツを使って（？）、<u>初代<b>『スーパーマリオカート』</b>のコースをモチーフにコースづくりをしてみました</u>！<br></p></div></div><div class="movie-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" movie-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="detail-movie" okra-youtube-element-component="" style=""><div class="okra-youtube ng-star-inserted" okrayoutubeplayer=""><div class="okra-youtube-inner"><div id="XRALkO7XD9Yu1ngcc2l" class="ng-star-inserted"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div carousel-element-component="" class="carousel-element ng-tns-c1-6 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="detail-switcher" okra-carousel-element-component="" okramql="" style="height:NaNpx;"><div class="okra-carousel" okracarousel=""><div class="detail-switcher__container"><div class="detail-switcher__stage" class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-7 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp href="/category?c=%E3%83%9E%E3%83%AA%E3%82%AA%E3%82%AB%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88%20%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%83%96%20%E3%83%9B%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B5%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AD%E3%83%83%E3%83%88" class="okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init"><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><b>Nintendo Switch『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』</b>が、本日10月16日（金）、発売されました！<br>『マリオカート ライブ ホームサーキット』のセットには、<u>カメラが内蔵された<b>カート</b></u>が入っています。<u>カートから見える<b>部屋の景色がサーキットに早変わり</b>する、リアルとゲームが連動した<b>新しい「マリオカート」</b></u>なんです。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-0 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-0 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-0 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16004247091640/400/01.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-0 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-0 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124023684064/400/02.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">本作をご存知ないという方は、まずはこちらの紹介映像をご覧ください。<br></p></div></div><div class="movie-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" movie-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="detail-movie" okra-youtube-element-component="" style=""><div class="okra-youtube ng-star-inserted" okrayoutubeplayer=""><div class="okra-youtube-inner"><div id="LvPON803cOQki72cq7n" class="ng-star-inserted"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">映像をご覧になって、「自分の部屋に、どうやってコースをつくったらいいの？」という疑問を持った方もいらっしゃるかもしれません。そこで、この記事では、<u>コースづくりのヒントをご紹介</u>します。<br></p></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">4つのゲートをくぐればサーキット完成<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">サーキットづくりはとても簡単。付属の<u>4つの<b>ゲート</b>を部屋に置いて、<b>カート</b>で1周するだけで、走った軌跡がそのままサーキットに</u>なります。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-1 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-1 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-1 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124514554578/400/03.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-1 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-1 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15124518409345/400/04.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">コースの描き方のコツ</span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">つくえやベッドをトンネルに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><u>コースづくりには、<b>6帖以上</b>のスペースがオススメ</u>です。とはいえ、何もないスペースを用意する必要はありません。<br>例えば<u>つくえやいすの脚の下</u>をサーキットにしてみると、トンネルのような見た目になり、レースの迫力が増します。また、脚が障害物になるので、あなたのドライブの腕が試されるコースに！<br></p></div></div><div carousel-element-component="" class="carousel-element ng-tns-c1-2 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="detail-switcher" okra-carousel-element-component="" okramql="" style="height:NaNpx;"><div class="okra-carousel" okracarousel=""><div class="detail-switcher__container"><div class="detail-switcher__stage" style="transform:translate3d(0px, 0, 0);transition-duration:0ms;"><div class="detail-switcher__item is-active ng-star-inserted"><div class="detail-switcher__media has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235917039508/0/05.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div><div class="detail-switcher__item ng-star-inserted"><div class="detail-switcher__media has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235921341892/0/06.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div><a href="#" class="detail-switcher__prev is-disabled ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;">PREV</a><a href="#" class="detail-switcher__next ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;">NEXT</a><div class="detail-switcher__pagination ng-star-inserted"><span class="detail-switcher__pagination-item is-current ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;"> 0 </span><span class="detail-switcher__pagination-item ng-star-inserted" style="display:none;"> 1 </span></div></div></div><div class="nc3-js-nav detail-switcher-nav" style="display:none;"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__wrap"><div class="swiper-container-2d0af188-313d-477b-a285-cb7cfd5527fc" classname="swiper-container-2d0af188-313d-477b-a285-cb7cfd5527fc"><ul class="detail-switcher-nav__itemWrap swiper-wrapper"><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-2 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner is-active"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__media" style="background-image:url(https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235917039508/400/05.jpg);"><span class="ng-tns-c1-2"></span></div></div></li><li class="detail-switcher-nav__item swiper-slide ng-tns-c1-2 ng-star-inserted"><div class="nc3-js-nav__item detail-switcher-nav__itemInner"><div class="detail-switcher-nav__media" style="background-image:url(https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235921341892/400/06.jpg);"><span class="ng-tns-c1-2"></span></div></div></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ベッドの下の隙間をルートにしてみると、比較的狭い場所でも遊べるうえ、普段なかなか見られない場所がサーキットの一部に変化して面白いかもしれません。<br></p></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ドリフトを想定した鋭角カーブ<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">カートを走らせながら<u><b>Rボタン</b>で<b>ドリフト</b>をすると、鋭角なカーブを描く</u>ことができ、<br>コースの形の幅が広がります。コースづくりでドリフトを多用すれば、ドリフトを使わないと大きなタイムロスになる鋭角カーブだらけのコースをつくることもできます。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235929088556/0/07.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div okra-text-element-component="" class="detail-img-outline-caption ng-star-inserted"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><span data-okra-font-size="4" style="color: rgb(60, 60, 60);">星形のコースだってつくれます。</span></p></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">空きスペースを細長いコースに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">細長い空きスペースしかない場合でも、ゲートを連続で置くことで長い直線を持つコースをつくることができます。直線上で<b>「ダッシュキノコ」</b>を使ってライバルにレースで逆転したりと、直線ならではのストイックな駆け引きが生まれるかもしれません。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235934840366/0/23.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">身の回りのものを使って、コースを装飾<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">小物をガードレールに<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">家で普段使っている雑貨などの小物を装飾に使うことで、サーキットの雰囲気はガラッと変化します。例えば、<u><b>コップ</b>をならべてコースの<b>ガードレール</b>に</u>使ったり、ティッシュの箱を障害物にして置いたりすると、見た目が華やかになるのに加え、ルートがわかりやすくなるメリットもあります。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-3 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-3 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-3 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15235955335031/400/08.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-3 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-3 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000000967550/400/09.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">カーペットでダートコースを演出<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">あえて毛足の短い<b>カーペット</b>などの上をコースに取り入れると、カートが走っている時のゲーム画面がガタガタと揺れ、ダートコースのような挙動となってレースの臨場感もアップします。<br></p></div></div><div class="image-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" image-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div okramql="" class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img clearfix img-width-65" style=""><div class="detail-img__inner"><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement" okramodal=""><div okra-image-element-component="" class="has-modal"><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000013911448/0/10.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">空き箱でトンネルづくり<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted"><u><b>段ボール</b>や<b>空き箱</b>、<b>画用紙</b>などで<b>トンネル</b>をつくる</u>こともできます。トンネルをルートに組み込めば、レース中の景色を一瞬にして暗くさせたり、奥に障害物を置いて遊んでもらう友達を驚かせることもできそうです。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-4 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-4 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-4 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000026443507/400/11.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-4 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-4 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/16000031359255/400/12.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="heading-h4-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h4-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div okra-text-element-component="" class="topics_detail-hSBorder" style=""><h4 okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">コースの案内は矢印看板で<br></h4></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style="margin-bottom:0;"><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">つくったコースを友達に遊んでもらった時、どちらに走ればいいかわかりにくそうな場所があった場合などには、<b>看板</b>の出番です。セットに2つ付属される<u><b>矢印看板</b>を部屋に置くと、ゲームの中では<b>動く矢印看板</b>に</u>早変わり。<br></p></div></div><div class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-5 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-img has-2item clearfix" okramql="" style=""><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-5 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-5 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15131039462582/400/13.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div><div class="detail-img__item"><div class="cboxElement ng-tns-c2-5 ng-star-inserted" okramodal=""><div class="ng-tns-c2-5 has-modal" okra-image-element-component=""><noscript class="ng-star-inserted"><img src="https://topics-cdn.nintendo.co.jp/image/2020/10/15131041939781/400/14.jpg" alt="" loading="lazy"></noscript></div></div></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">矢印看板が２つで足りない場合は、<u>同じものを<b>コピー印刷</b>して増やすことも</u>できます。また、<a href="https://www.nintendo.co.jp/support/switch/software_support/img/mklive/gate.pdf" target="_blank"><b>こちら</b></a>から<u><b>矢印看板</b>や<b>ゲート</b>の<b>印刷用データ（pdf）</b></u><u>をダウンロード</u>できますので、<b>A4サイズ</b>で印刷してコースづくりにご活用ください！</p></div></div><div class="heading-h2-line-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" heading-h2-line-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="topics_detail-headLineL" style=""><h2 class="topics_detail-headLMain"><span okra-text-element-component=""><span okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">初代マリオカートのコースをつくって<br>遊んでみました<br></span></span></h2></div></div></div><div class="text-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit="" text-element-component=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp detail-text" okra-text-element-component="" okramql="" style=""><p okraclientoverwritelink="" class="ng-star-inserted">ここまでにご紹介したコースづくりのコツを使って（？）、<u>初代<b>『スーパーマリオカート』</b>のコースをモチーフにコースづくりをしてみました</u>！<br></p></div></div><div class="movie-element okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" movie-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp" okramql=""><div class="detail-movie" okra-youtube-element-component="" style=""><div class="okra-youtube ng-star-inserted" okrayoutubeplayer=""><div class="okra-youtube-inner"><div id="XRALkO7XD9Yu1ngcc2l" class="ng-star-inserted"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div carousel-element-component="" class="carousel-element ng-tns-c1-6 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="detail-switcher" okra-carousel-element-component="" okramql="" style="height:NaNpx;"><div class="okra-carousel" okracarousel=""><div class="detail-switcher__container"><div class="detail-switcher__stage" class="images-2column-element ng-tns-c2-7 okra-style-on-init okra-style-after-init ng-star-inserted" images-2column-element-component="" okrastyleoninit=""><div class="nc3-l-innerWidth--tabSp href="/category?c=%E3%83%9E%E3%83%AA%E3%82%AA%E3%82%AB%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88%20%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%83%96%20%E3%83%9B%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B5%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AD%E3%83%83%E3%83%88"
